author: wtopstaff
title: Saturday’s Sports Transactions
text:
Home » News » Sports » Saturday's Sports Transactions Saturday’s Sports Transactions By The Associated Press October 3, 2015 3:05 pm BASEBALL 
TORONTO BLUE JAYS — Assigned RHP Donn Roach outright to Buffalo (IL). National League 
MIAMI MARLINS — Assigned LHP Chris Reed outright to New Orleans (PCL). FOOTBALL 
CLEVELAND BROWNS — Terminated OT Andrew McDonald from the practice squad. 
MINNESOTA VIKINGS — Waived CB Shaun Prater. 
NEW YORK JETS — Signed TE Wes Saxton from the practice squad and DT Deon Simon to the practice squad. 
PITTSBURGH STEELERS — Signed DT Caushaud Lyons to the practice squad. Signed PK Chris Boswell. 
ST. LOUIS RAMS — Traded WR Chris Givens to Baltimore for a conditional draft pick. Waived CB Brandon McGee. Signed DB Christian Bryant from the practice squad and CB Eric Patterson to the practice squad. HOCKEY 
CALGARY FLAMES — Assigned C Drew Shore to Stockton (AHL). 
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Released F Tyler Kennedy from his professional tryout agreement. 
NEW YORK RANGERS — Assigned F Jayson Megna and D Raphael Diaz to Hartford (AHL). American Hockey League 
SAN ANTONIO RAMPAGE — Reassigned G Pat Nagle, RWs Reid Halabi and Brock Montgomery and D Will Weber, Cody Sol and Austin Levi to Fort Wayne (ECHL). Topics:
